entities.description: Units by which substances are measured such as Kilogram, Ounce, Pound, Milliliter, Liter, Fluid Ounce, Gallon, Dosage Unit/Items, and Number of Plants.
Frequency and percentage of various units of substance measurement in the dataset.

Types of substances like Crack Cocaine, Cocaine, Hashish, Heroin, Marijuana, Morphine, Opium, Other Narcotics, LSD, PCP, Other Hallucinogens, Amphetamines/Methamphetamines, Other Stimulants, Barbiturates, Other Depressants, Other Drugs: Antidepressants.
The unweighted count of each type of substance reported.
The percentage representation of each type of substance reported.

relationships.description: Specifies the units by which the substance is measured.
Associate the measurement unit with its unweighted frequency in the dataset.
Associate the measurement unit with its percentage representation in the dataset.
